name: Hamster's Nightmare
description:
My entry for the ludum dare 47 jam!

Controls Keyboard:

  • WADS for movement
  • Spacebar for dash attack

Gamepad (preferred method of play):

  • Left analog for movement
  • Hopefully any of the face buttons should trigger the dash attack

Try to survive as long as you can in the constantly retracting cat loop of doom. Thanks for trying the game. Much love to everyone!
